name: Preacher
description: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
first_night_desc: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.
other_night_desc: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.
